title: mAmava mahEshvari
sahitya:
mAmava mahEshvari cAmuNDEshvari gauri mAngalya ratnAkari shrI shankha mukhEshvari


anupallavi

  shrI mAtaha sarvEshvari shrta varAbhayakari shrI himAdri kumAri shrI shiva cEtOhari 


caraNam    dEhi shubham shrIkari bhairavi nirantari dEva dEvEshvari hE tripurasundari 
dEhi cittAtma dOSa bhangakari shankari dEvi vana tulasIdala dhAri vishvambhari
